ivardefs.name: actuality
ivardefs.desc: Whether the event actually happened, or just had the potential to. Note that this is independent of whether anyone was affected or harmed or how severely.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: The overall type of event, intended for search and filtering purposes.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Specific event that occurred or that was averted, such as patient fall, wrong organ removed, or wrong blood transfused.

ivardefs.name: contributingFactor_
ivardefs.desc: The contributing factors suspected to have increased the probability or severity of the adverse event.

ivardefs.name: detected
ivardefs.desc: Estimated or actual date the AdverseEvent began, in the opinion of the reporter.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The Encounter during which AdverseEvent was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this adverse event by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: The information about where the adverse event occurred.

ivardefs.name: mitigatingAction_
ivardefs.desc: The ameliorating action taken after the adverse event occured in order to reduce the extent of harm.

ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event, such as resolved, recovering, ongoing, resolved-with-sequelae, or fatal.

ivardefs.name: participant_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who or what participated in the adverse event and how they were involved.

ivardefs.name: preventiveAction_
ivardefs.desc: Preventive actions that contributed to avoiding the adverse event.

ivardefs.name: recordedDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the existence of the AdverseEvent was first recorded.

ivardefs.name: recorder
ivardefs.desc: Information on who recorded the adverse event.  May be the patient or a practitioner.

ivardefs.name: resultingCondition_
ivardefs.desc: Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical).

ivardefs.name: seriousness
ivardefs.desc: Assessment whether this event, or averted event, was of clinical importance.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The current state of the data entry of the adverse event or potential adverse event.

ivardefs.name: study_
ivardefs.desc: The research study that the subject is enrolled in.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: This subject or group impacted by the event.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Supporting information relevant to the event.

ivardefs.name: suspectEntity_
ivardefs.desc: Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event.

properties.desc: An event (i.e. any change to current patient status) that may be related to unintended effects on a patient or research subject.  The unintended effects may require additional monitoring, treatment or hospitalization or may result in death.  The AdverseEv
